review: 동국대학교와 남산 초입에 있는 공원입니다. 서울 중심지에 있지만 사람이 많지 않고 조용해서 쉬기에 좋습니다. 근처에는 신라호텔과 앰버서더 호텔이 있습니다.
review_en: It is a park at the entrance of Dongguk University and Namsan Mountain. It's located in central Seoul, but it's not crowded and it's quiet, so it is quiet. There are Shilla Hotel and Ambassadors Hotel nearby.

review: 장충동에서 밥을 먹고 나서 천천히 산책하기 좋았음. 아이들이나 강아지들과 함께 산책하는 사람들도 많았고, 이곳에서 조금 더 지나가면 남산에도 올라갈 수 있으니 시간 내서 남산 산책로까지 걸어볼 것을 추천
review_en: It was good to take a walk slowly after eating in Jangchung-dong. There were many people who took a walk with their children or puppies, and if you go a little further, you can go up Namsan Mountain, so I recommend you take some time to walk to the Namsan trail.

review: 근처 앰베서더에서 조식 후 간단히 산책이 하고 싶었는데 딱 좋았습니다. 아이 킥보드를 들고 갔었는데 간단히 킥보드도 탈 수 있고 놀이터가 있어서 아이들 뛰어놀기는 딱 좋았습니다. 나무도 많고 산책하기 좋은 공원이었습니다.
review_en: I wanted to take a quick walk after breakfast at a nearby Ambassador, and it was perfect. I took the child kickboard with me, and I could ride it simply and there was a playground, so it was perfect for children to run around. It was a good park to take a walk with lots of trees.

review: 주변은 동대문과 종로 을지로로 이어지는 서울의 요소중 하나다. 크지 않고 작지만..다리가 있고 정자가 있고 호수가 있는 무척 아기자기한 곳이다. 게다가 면세점 호텔 등 식도락 식당이 근처에 있다. 충분히 즐기만한 곳이다. 따뜻한 봄날 남산 올라가기 힘드시거나 아님 내려오는길에 잠깐 다리를 쉬어갈만 한 곳이다.
review_en: The surrounding area is one of the elements of Seoul leading to Dongdaemun and Jongno Eulji-ro. It's not big. It's small.It is a very cute place with a bridge, a pavilion, and a lake. In addition, there are gourmet restaurants nearby, including duty-free hotels. It's a good place to enjoy. On a warm spring day, it is difficult to climb Namsan Mountain or take a short rest on the way down.

review_en: After eating the King's breakfast, I went for a walk to Jangchungdan Park. The sound of the birds, the wind, the sound of falling leaves, it was all a pleasant morning.

review: 호젓하고 잘 정돈된 공원입니다,꽃공원,놀이터,작은 폭포도 있고요,단,도보 도로가 시멘트로 되어 있어 걸을 때 좀 딱딱한 느낌이 드는데요,요즘 다른 공원들이 많이 갖추고 있는 것처럼 푹신한 느낌이 드는 도로였으면 더 좋을 듯 합니다.
review_en: It's a quiet and well-organized park, with flower parks, playgrounds, and small waterfalls, but the walking road feels a bit hard when you walk, and I hope it's a soft road like many other parks have these days.
